alert.note: Alert for Grant (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:01PM CDT until August 16 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLEVELAND...SOUTHERN GRANT AND NORTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carthage, or 15 miles south of Sheridan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leola... Carthage... Dogwood... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Ain... Tulip... Grapevine... Farindale... Bunn... Millerville... Cross Roads in Grant County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
